languages.text: "Обычно Волков поминают мьодом, но придется довольствоваться самодельным бальзамом. Я сварил его сам — кое-какие ядовитые травки с Януса, кое-какие редкие токсины, выменянные на Футфоле. Может, отрава сия и обманет телесную мощь Астартес".

"Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."
languages.original_text: "Обычно Волков поминают мьодом, но придется довольствоваться самодельным бальзамом. Я сварил его сам — кое-какие ядовитые травки с Януса, кое-какие редкие токсины, выменянные на Футфоле. Может, отрава сия и обманет телесную мощь Астартес".

traits.locale_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “一般来说，我们野狼都是用蜜酒来纪念兄弟，但我现在只能用我自己酿的东西来凑合一下。这种酒是用加努斯的毒草，还有从落脚港弄到的稀有毒物酿出来的，或许这样的酒可以战胜星际战士的铁胃。”
languages.original_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."

traits.locale_text: “一般来说，我们野狼都是用蜜酒来纪念兄弟，但我现在只能用我自己酿的东西来凑合一下。这种酒是用加努斯的毒草，还有从落脚港弄到的稀有毒物酿出来的，或许这样的酒可以战胜星际战士的铁胃。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「狼はミョードで追悼するのが通例だが、俺は自家製のこいつで済ませることにしてる。ヤヌスでとれた毒草を少々、それとフットフォールで手に入れた珍しい毒物を煎じたものだ。こいつでアスタルテスの肉体を越えられるかもしれんぞ」
languages.original_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."

traits.locale_text: 「狼はミードで追悼するのが通例だが、俺は自家製のこいつで済ませることにしてる。ヤヌスでとれた毒草を少々、それとフットフォールで手に入れた珍しい毒物を煎じたものだ。こいつでアスタルテスの肉体を越えられるかもしれんぞ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Normalmente conmemoramos a los Lobos con mjod, pero tendremos que contentarnos con algo de cosecha propia: hierbas venenosas de Janus combinadas con toxinas raras obtenidas en Paso. Tal vez sea lo bastante poderoso como para superar la tolerancia de un Astartes».
languages.original_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."

traits.locale_text: «Normalmente conmemoramos a los Lobos con mjod, pero tendremos que contentarnos con algo de cosecha propia: hierbas venenosas de Janus combinadas con toxinas raras obtenidas en Paso. Tal vez sea lo bastante poderoso como para superar la tolerancia de un Astartes».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Habituellement, c'est du mjod que l'on boit à la mémoire des Loups, mais je vais devoir me contenter d'une mixture de ma préparation : quelques herbes nocives de Janus et des toxines rares obtenues à Castel. Cette boisson viendra peut-être à bout de la résistance physique d'un Astartes. »
languages.original_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."

traits.locale_text: « Habituellement, c'est du mjod que l'on boit à la mémoire des Loups, mais je vais devoir me contenter d'une mixture de ma préparation : quelques herbes nocives de Janus et des toxines rares obtenues à Castel. Cette boisson viendra peut-être à bout de la résistance physique d'un Astartes. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Üblicherweise erfolgt das Gedenken an Wölfe mit Mjod, aber ich muss mich auf etwas beschränken, das ich selbst hergestellt habe – ein paar Giftkräuter von Janus, einige auf Footfall erstandene seltene Toxine. Vielleicht übermannt dieses Gebräu sogar die körperliche Kraft eines Astartes."
languages.original_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."

traits.locale_text: "Üblicherweise erfolgt das Gedenken an Wölfe mit Mjod, aber ich muss mich auf etwas beschränken, das ich selbst hergestellt habe – ein paar Giftkräuter von Janus, einige auf Footfall erstandene seltene Toxine. Vielleicht übermannt dieses Gebräu sogar die körperliche Kraft eines Astartes."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Kurtlar genelde mjod içmeleriyle bilinir. Bizse kendi yaptığım bir şeyle idare edeceğiz. Janus'taki birkaç zehirli ot ile Binliman'da takas ettiğim nadir toksinlerden yaptım. Belki bu karışım, Astartes'in fiziksel direncini kırabilir."
languages.original_text: "Usually Wolves are commemorated with mjod, but I'll have to settle for something I made myself — a few poisonous herbs from Janus, some rare toxins traded on Footfall. Maybe this brew will overcome the physical might of an Astartes."

traits.locale_text: "Kurtlar genelde mjod ile anılır ama kendi yaptığım bir şeyle idare etmemiz gerekiyor. Janus'tan birkaç zehirli ot ve Binliman'da takas ettiğim nadir toksinlerden yapmıştım. Belki bu karışım, Astartes'in fiziksel gücünü alt eder."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
